title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4801.2 - Time for filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4801.2 - Time for filing

State Regulations

Notice of such delegation of responsibility and
authority, modifications or revocations thereof, must be filed with the
commission within three days after the date of such
delegation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4801.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
